results.title: Australia's wheat
results.creator_credit: Kit Guyatt, John Gray, Heinz Fenke, Lilias Fraser, Stephen Carthew, AWB Limited and Fraser Castle Productions
results.brief_description: Provides an outline of the Australian wheat industry, a brief history and general view of growing, harvesting, bulk handling and processing, research and marketing. Shows the industry from the historical beginnings at Experiment Farm and the growing colony of New South Wales, to mechanical innovation, nationwide research and modern transport and handling. Explains the farmer’s work through each season and traces the marketing of the grain from the country silo to the consumers overseas.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kit Guyatt, John Gray, Heinz Fenke, Lilias Fraser, Stephen Carthew, AWB Limited and Fraser Castle Productions
results.description: Provides an outline of the Australian wheat industry, a brief history and general view of growing, harvesting, bulk handling and processing, research and marketing. Explains the farmer’s work through each season and traces the marketing of the grain from the country silo to the consumers overseas.

results.title: Australian by design
results.creator_credit: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Fraser Castle Productions
results.brief_description: The manufacture of Australia’s own car from the initial design on a drawing board to the completed vehicle as it comes off the assembly line. Precedence is given to safety in both design and engineering. Rigorous tests are carried out at Lang Lang testing track which incorporates all types of road conditions. In creating an automotive industry G.M.H. has stimulated the nation’s industries and economy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle and Fraser Castle Productions

results.title: From Melville to Melbourne
results.creator_credit: Tristan Mungatopi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Growing up in two worlds allows me to give back to my community. Tristan Mungatopi, a young Tiwi man’s search for identity and connection.

results.title: Life and learning

results.title: Morehu
results.brief_description: Rita Morrison’s mother died three days after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. Her grief would link these two events forever. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: My wardrobe door
results.brief_description: Nadia Rose’s wardrobe door is full of photo’s of her friends and family. It keeps them close to her even when she is far away. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.
